name: Happy Lil' Virus
description:
It's a wonderful day to be a virus! Let's explore the network together!

For GMTK 2021; Joined Together

LMB to interact. Feedback is provided through sound; please play with sound if available.

Straightforward little puzzle game; needed a bit longer to refine the mechanics into something solid, but got distracted by writing my first shader (push spacebar to see how proud I am of it ;-)).

Made using Godot, Aseprite and https://sfxr.me/. Solo project.

Project at https://github.com/Thingus/gmtk_2021
